value:
$WmMPID_水着マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Swim17,Face|$w0|Ahh... Blue skies, beautiful beaches...
This island truly is a tropical paradise.$k$p$WmMPID_水着レオン,ch05_24_Leon_M_Swim17,Face|$w0|Have you failed to notice the boat is
aimlessly adrift?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|I've found you, my charming Nohrian
princes! It's hard work, chasing down
such fine specimens of manhood.$k$pBut someone has to do it! So just sit
tight while we free you from those
pesky contracts!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_水着マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Swim17,Face|$w0|We simply cannot abandon Corrin
and Elise. Leo, we have no recourse
but...to swim. All the way to shore...$k$pGods help me...$k$p$WmMPID_水着レオン,ch05_24_Leon_M_Swim17,Face|$w0|I tried to tell everyone... I have no
interest in tropical islands.$k$p$Sbs150|
